StationType.name: Sung slave camp
StationType.attributes: enemy, envAir, envEarth, envFire, envWater, generic, human, populated, sungSlaveCamp, sungSlavers

Events.OnCreate:
; Count the number of slave quarters in the area
(objSetData gSource "totalSlaveCount" (count (sysFindObject gSource "T:sungSlaveQuarters; N:8;")) )

Language.Text:
You spend 5 credits while listening to a drunk woman:
"My sister-in-law was abducted by those filthy Sung. We finally got her released by buying her contract. I can't believe they allow slavery to exist. Hey, can you buy me a drink?"
You are docked at a ruined structure once housing slaves. Lifeless forms float around in zero-G amid the scraps and mementos they once owned.
You are docked at a ruined structure once housing slaves. Lifeless forms float around in zero-G amid the scraps and mementos they once owned.

ItemType.name: slave coffin
ItemType.description: The Sung Slavers of Jiang's Star transport their slaves in life-support canisters that keep their captive occupants in biological suspension.

DockScreen.OnScreenInit:
(block ( (slaverObj (sysFindObject gSource "T:sungSlaveCamp; N")) (sungState (objGetData slaverObj 'sungState)) (coffinCount (objGetData slaverObj 'coffinCount)) ) ; Remember the Slave camp object
(scrSetData gScreen 'slaverObj slaverObj)
; Figure out what to do.
; When we first dock, we compute the number of slaves rescued ; by the player.
(switch ; If the slave camp is not dead, then nothing to.
(or (not slaverObj) (not (objIsAbandoned slaverObj))) Nil
; See if we need to calculate how many coffins to add
(not sungState) (block ( (totalSlaveCount (objGetData slaverObj 'totalSlaveCount))
; Get all the slave quarters
(slaves (sysFindObject slaverObj "T:sungSlaveQuarters; N:8;"))
; Count how many are still alive
(alive (map slaves 'reduceSum slaveObj (if (objIsAbandoned slaveObj) 0 1) ) )
; The dead are the total minus the living
(dead (- totalSlaveCount alive))
; For each surviving slave quarter, there is a 50% ; chance of a surviving slave coffin
(slaveCoffins (map (make 'sequence alive) 'reduceSum i (round 'stochastic 0.5) ) ) ) (switch ; If there are more dead than alive, the player ; gets nothing.
(gr dead alive) (objSetData slaverObj 'sungState 'angry)
; If no coffins, then too many died
(= slaveCoffins 0) (objSetData slaverObj 'sungState 'allDead)
; Otherwise, we add slave coffins to the station
(block () (objAddItem gSource (itmCreate &itSlaveCoffin; slaveCoffins)) (objSetData slaverObj 'sungState 'coffins) ) ) )
; If the player left some coffins behind, add them
coffinCount (block () (objAddItem gSource (itmCreate &itSlaveCoffin; coffinCount)) (objSetData slaverObj 'coffinCount Nil) ) ) )

Default.OnPaneInit:
(block ( (slaverObj (scrGetData gScreen 'slaverObj)) (sungState (objGetData slaverObj 'sungState)) (showLoot Nil) ) (switch (not slaverObj) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descEmpty)
(not (objIsAbandoned slaverObj)) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descNotFree)
(or (not sungState) (= sungState 'done)) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descEmpty)
(= sungState 'angry) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descNoReward)
(= sungState 'allDead) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descNoReward)
; Otherwise, there are slaves that need to be taken by ; the player.
(objGetItems gSource "* +unid:&itSlaveCoffin;") (block () ; If we've already looted at least once, then ; we have a slightly different message
(if (= sungState 'coffinsTaken) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descWelcomeBack) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descWelcome) ) (setq showLoot True) )
; Otherwise, thanks!
(scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descDone) )
(scrShowAction gScreen 'actionLiberate showLoot) )

Actions.Action:
(block ( (slaverObj (scrGetData gScreen 'slaverObj)) (sungState (objGetData slaverObj 'sungState)) (coffinsLeft (@ (objGetItems gSource "* +unid:&itSlaveCoffin;") 0)) ) (switch coffinsLeft (block () (objRemoveItem gSource coffinsLeft) (objSetData slaverObj 'coffinCount (itmGetCount coffinsLeft)) (objSetData slaverObj 'sungState 'coffinsTaken) )
(or (= sungState 'coffinsTaken) (= sungState 'conffins) ) (objSetData slaverObj 'sungState 'done) )
(scrExitScreen gScreen) )

Language.Text:
As you enter the station you are surrounded by cheering families:
"Thank you for freeing us! The Slavers are finally dead! But some of our people are still not liberated. Please take them to a place where they can be free."

Worried families surround you:
"Our people are still not liberated. Please take them to a place where they can be free."
"Thank you again for saving us! We will never forget you."

You are docked at a station once used to house slaves of the Sung Empire. Now abandoned, these living quarters appear no worse than sub-standard corporate quarters.
But a closer look reveals surveillance sensors and discarded docility collars.

You are docked at the living quarters of a small slave community. Though free at last, they weep for the hundreds who died in the attack and for the family that the dead have left behind.
The piercing wail of the inconsolable does not completely mask the anger of those looking for revenge.
You are not welcome here.

You are docked at a station used to house slaves. Two men meet you at the airlock:
"Get out of here! Leave while you can before the Slavers return!"
